crewMemberName.definition: The official first name or set of names, expressed as text, by which this crew member is known in its identity documents.

crewMemberFamilyName.definition: The official family name or set of names, expressed as text, by which this crew member is known in its identity documents.

crewMemberNationality.definition: A country that constitutes a nationality by origin, birth, or naturalization for this crew member.

crewMemberPosition.definition: A description of the flight deck or cabin position for the specific crew member.

crewMemberAge.definition: A measure of the age of this crew member such as his/her age at a particular point in time.

crewMemberExperience.definition: A measure of the experience of this crew member in terms of years working in the specific position at a particular point in time.

crewMemberSkills.definition: The skills of this crew member for a specific position at a particular point in time.

cabinCrewMemberEmployer.definition: Details for the cabin crew member employer.

cockpitCrewMemberEmployer.definition: Details for the cockpit crew member employer.

crewMemberGenderCode.definition: A code specifying the gender of this crew member such as male, female.

crewMemberBirthDateTime.definition: A date, time, date time or other date time value which specifies the birth date for this crew member.

crewMemberBirthLocation.definition: A location where this crew member was born.

crewMemberResidenceAddress.definition: A residence address for this crew member.

crewMemberContactEmail.definition: The email for communication with the crew member.

crewMemberContactTelephone.definition: The text string of characters that make up the complete number for this telephone communication, including the country access code for this communication number.

fuel.definition: The substance that is used to provide heat or power, usually by being burned, in the aircraft.

fuelPolicy.definition: A policy representing the vertical flightprofile and reserve fuel definition. Typical scenarios distinguish between an American, European and Asien definition.

blockFuel.definition: The total fuel required from off-block at departure until on-block at destination, measured as volume. It is the sum of the trip fuel plus APU fuel, engine start fuel and taxi fuel.

blockFuelMass.definition: The total fuel required from off-block at departure until on-block at destination, measured as mass. It is the sum of the trip fuel plus APU fuel, engine start fuel and taxi fuel.

tripFuel.definition: The total amount of fuel required for the flight, measured as volume.

tripFuelMass.definition: The total amount of fuel required for the flight, measured as mass.

contigencyFuel.definition: The fuel portion of achieving the contigency fuel definition, e.g. flying a holding above the destination airport, measured as volume.

contigencyFuelMass.definition: The fuel portion of achieving the contigency fuel definition, e.g. flying a holding above the destination airport, measured as mass.

reserveFuel.definition: The total amount of fuel reserves, measured as volume. It is the sum of the fuel required for the flight and contingency fuel definition.

reserveFuelMass.definition: The total amount of fuel reserves, measured as mass. It is the sum of the fuel required for the flight and contingency fuel definition.

tankeredFuel.definition: The portion of fuel that is available for a succeeding flight leg, measured as volume. It is only applicable for concatenated flight legs.

tankeredFuelMass.definition: The portion of fuel that is available for a succeeding flight leg, measured as mass. It is only applicable for concatenated flight legs.

topupFuel.definition: The portion of fuel being refuelled at destination for accomplishing a succeeding flight leg, measured as volume. It is only applicable for concatenated flight legs.

topupFuelMass.definition: The portion of fuel being refuelled at destination for accomplishing a succeeding flight leg, measured as mass. It is only applicable for concatenated flight legs.

totalFuel.definition: The total amount of fuel required for the flight, including the block fuel and the reserve fuel, measured as volume.

totalFuelMass.definition: The total amount of fuel required for the flight, including the block fuel and the reserve fuel, measured as mass.

fuelPrice.definition: The actual price of the fuel required for the flight.

weather.definition: The conditions in the air above the earth such as wind, rain, or temperature, especially at a particular time over a particular area.

weatherConditionsStatus.definition: An indication whether the weather conditions refer to a weather forecast or observed weather.

weatherConditionsIssueTime.definition: The time that the weather condition report was issued.

weatherConditionsLocation.definition: The location that the weather condition report concerns.

weatherConditionsDetails.definition: A description of the weather condition report that may refer to drizzle, duststorm, fog, funnel cloud, hail, haze, ice crystals, ice pellets, mist, rain, sand, sandstorm, small hail and/or snow pellets, smoke, snow, snow grains, spray, squalls, tornado/waterspout, unknown precipitation, volcanic ash, well-developed dust/sand whirls, widespread dust.

weatherPrecipitationProbability.definition: The probability of precipitation, i.e. of Water that falls from the clouds towards the ground, especially as rain or snow.

weatherPrecipitationRate.definition: The rate of precipitation, i.e. water that falls from the clouds towards the ground, especially as rain or snow.

weatherIntensity.definition: An indicator of the intensity of the weather: light, moderate, heavy.

weatherProximity.definition: The location of the weather phenomena in relation to the reporting station: immediate proximity or in vicinity.

weatherQualifier.definition: An additional qualifier describing the reported weather phenomenon: shallow, partial, patchy, low drifting, blowing, shower, thunderstorm, freezing.

enRouteMeanTemperature.definition: The mean, en-route cruise temperature situations.

enRouteMaxTemperature.definition: The maximum en-route cruise temperature situations.

enRouteMinTemperature.definition: The minimum en-route cruise temperature situations.

surfaceMeanTemperature.definition: The average airport temperature situations, defined as a static air temperature (SAT).

surfaceMaxTemperature.definition: The maximum airport temperature situations, defined as a static air temperature (SAT).

surfaceMinTemperature.definition: The minimum airport temperature situations, defined as a static air temperature (SAT).

enRouteMeanWindSpeed.definition: The average en-route cruise wind speed situations, defined as a longitudinal wind, i.e. the wind component in direction of the aircraft fuselage. A negative wind value means headwind, a positive wind value means tailwind.

enRouteMinWindSpeed.definition: The minimum en-route cruise wind speed situations, defined as a longitudinal wind, i.e. the wind component in direction of the aircraft fuselage. A negative wind value means headwind, a positive wind value means tailwind.

enRouteMaxWindSpeed.definition: The maximum en-route cruise wind speed situations, defined as a longitudinal wind, i.e. the wind component in direction of the aircraft fuselage. A negative wind value means headwind, a positive wind value means tailwind.

surfaceMeanWindSpeed.definition: The wind speed situations in the airport.

surfaceMinWindSpeed.definition: The minimum wind speed situations in the airport.

surfaceMaxWindSpeed.definition: The maximum wind speed situations in the airport.

enRouteWindGust.definition: The en-route cruise wind gust situations.

surfaceWindGust.definition: The wind gust in the airport.

enRouteWindBearing.definition: The direction that the wind is coming from, during the en-route cruise.

surfaceWindBearing.definition: The direction that the wind is coming from, in the arrival/departure airport.

enRouteMeanVisibility.definition: The average visibility, during the en-route cruise.

enRouteMinVisibility.definition: The minimum visibility, during the en-route cruise.

enRouteMaxVisibility.definition: The maximum visibility, during the en-route cruise.

surfaceMeanVisibility.definition: The average visibility in the arrival/departure airport.

surfaceMinVisibility.definition: The minimum visibility in the arrival/departure airport.

surfaceMaxVisibility.definition: The maximum visibility in the arrival/departure airport.

enRouteAbsoluteHumidity.definition: An absolute measurement of how much water there is in the air, during the en-route cruise.

enRouteRelativeHumidity.definition: A relative measurement of how much water there is in the air, during the en-route cruise.

surfaceAbsoluteHumidity.definition: An absolute measurement of how much water there is in the air, in the arrival/departure airport.

surfaceRelativeHumidity.definition: A relative measurement of how much water there is in the air, in the arrival/departure airport.

enRouteCloudCover.definition: The percentage of sky occluded by clouds during the en-route cruise.

airportCloudCover.definition: The percentage of sky occluded by clouds in the arrival/departure airport.

enRouteUVIndex.definition: The ultraviolet solar radiation during the en-route cruise.

surfaceUVIndex.definition: The ultraviolet solar radiation in the arrival/departure airport.

seaLevelMeanPressure.definition: The mean sea level pressure measured under the associated meteorological conditions.

seaLevelMinPressure.definition: The minimum sea level pressure measured under the associated meteorological conditions.

seaLevelMaxPressure.definition: The maximum sea level pressure measured under the associated meteorological conditions.

provenanceData.definition: Details regarding the provenance of each row in a dataset

dateAvailable.definition: The datetime when a row was created / inserted in a dataset.

dateModified.definition: The datetime when a row was last modified.

dateValidFrom.definition: The datetime from when a row is valid.

dateValidTo.definition: The datetime until when a row is valid.

referenceYear.definition: The reference year for which a row is valid.

referenceSemester.definition: The reference semester for which a row is valid.

referenceQuarter.definition: The reference quarter for which a row is valid.

referenceMonth.definition: The reference month for which a row is valid.

referenceMonthNumber.definition: The reference month for which a row is valid as an integer value.

referenceSeason.definition: The reference season for which a row is valid.

errorIndication.definition: An indication to identify any type of errors.

recordID.definition: A free format text assigned to uniquely identify a data entry.

referenceID.definition: A reference to another record identifier.

calculationID.definition: A unique identifier regarding any calculation.

location.definition: A specific place or position identifying an airport or a city.

cityCode.definition: The city code where an airport belongs in case of a multi-airport city.

locationType.definition: A type associated to this location, e.g. single airport location, airport in a multi-airport city, multi-airport city.

locationSubType.definition: A sub-type associated to this location, e.g. airport, bus station, metro/underground, harbour, etc.

locationName.definition: The official name with which this location is known.

countryCode.definition: The ISO country code to which this location belongs.

countryName.definition: The ISO country name to which this location belongs.

subCountryCode.definition: A sub-country code to identify specific regions or remote island groups, to which this location belongs.

stateCode.definition: The state code in a country, to which this location belongs.

locationTimezone.definition: The normal time variation from GMT/UTC as an indication of which of the twenty-four parts into which the world is divided this location belongs to.

locationDaylightSavingTime.definition: The normal time variation from GMT/UTC when Daylight Saving Time (advancing clocks during summer months so that darkness falls later each day according to the clock) is applied.

daylightSavingTimeStartDateTime.definition: The local datetime when Daylight Saving Time starts.

daylightSavingTimeStartStatus.definition: An status indication whether the start of the Daylight Saving Time has been confirmed by the national carrier and/or the government.

daylightSavingTimeEndDateTime.definition: The local datetime when Daylight Saving Time ends.

daylightSavingTimeEndStatus.definition: An status indication whether the end of the Daylight Saving Time has been confirmed by the national carrier and/or the government.

timeDivision.definition: An indicator whether the specific location's country is split into various time zones.

longitude.definition: The location's co-ordinates in terms of distance east or west of an imaginary line between the North Pole and the South Pole, measured in degrees.

latitude.definition: The location's co-ordinates in terms of position north or south of the equator, measured in degrees.

status.definition: An indicator of the status of the location to identify whether it is currently active.

characteristicName.definition: The name of a characteristic associated with a specific location, e.g. GDP per capita, share of population below poverty line or other demographic characteristics.

characteristicRange.definition: The range of a characteristic associated with a specific location.

characteristicValue.definition: The value of a characteristic associated with a specific location.

locationEvent.definition: A description of an event that takes place in a location.

locationCarbonEmissions.definition: The total Carbon Emissions for a specific location and time period, e.g. yearly.

locationCarbonEmissionsGrowth.definition: The  CO2 emissions growth between 2 consecutive years for a specific location.

locationAirTraffic.definition: The air traffic for a specific location and time period, e.g. yearly.

locationAirTrafficGrowth.definition: The air traffic growth between 2 consecutive years for a specific location.

averageDistanceFlownLevel.definition: The average distance flown level related to this location.

directDistanceFlownLevel.definition: The direct distance flown level related to this location.

actualDistanceFlownLevel.definition: The actual, achieved distance flown level related to this location.

airportsCount.definition: The number of airports in an area / location.

event.definition: A specific event happening in a location or during a flight, which can be either actual or the outcome of a simulation.

eventType.definition: The type of an event occuring in a specific reference datetime.

eventActualOccurence.definition: The datetime when an event has occured.

eventExpectedOccurence.definition: The datetime when an event is expected to occur.

eventReport.definition: A description of any event occuring to a flight leg or a location in a specific reference datetime.

eventCompartment.definition: The classification of the individuals affected by the specific event.

eventQuantityValue.definition: The value of an event indicator/quantity of interest.

eventQuantityMethod.definition: The statistic average used to compute the value of the event quantity (mean, median, ...).

airspace.definition: An airspace block based on operational requirements and established regardless of State boundaries, where the provision of air navigation services and related functions are performance-driven and optimized with a view to introducing, in each functional airspace block, enhanced cooperation among air navigation service providers or, where appropriate, an integrated provider.

airspaceBlockName.definition: The name of the airspace block as declared to the European Commision.

airspaceBlockAverageDailyFlights.definition: The number of average flights of a functional airspace block per day.

airspaceBlockTotalFlights.definition: The number of total flights of a functional airspace block.

airspaceBlockFlightsChangePercentage.definition: A percentage of flight changes in an airspace block.
